column4: I had to uninstall audacity as the beta version supported by hardy cannot find my sound output device. The repository also does not contain a stable audacity version. Any help pl?
if it is in the repo's then the Ubuntu devs/community believe it to be 'stable'
but audacity, 1.3.+ is a beta version. In my computer, It does not recognize my sound device!
im not disputing that im just saying it is considered stable enough for the repo's
